author: benh
msg: Update configure.twitter based on environmental changes. aka use the new python26 location.

author: benh
msg: Using sessions and doing process group killing in order to cleanup most descendants of an executor (this still will not cleanup any descendants that create their own process group or session, but hopefully that is unlikely, and if the organization is doing that then they probably really know what they are doing).

author: benh
msg: Fixed heartbeats to recognize lost slaves. In the future, the last heartbeat timeout should be configurable.

author: benh
msg: Updated old use of Task to now use common TaskInfo struct.

author: benh
msg: Added get-master command to EC2 script.
